sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY ( CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, CMPY_CORP_TYPE, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS,TEAM_ID )values ( #id#, #crn#,#processCycleId#,#tableBottomNotes#, #title#, sysdate,#updateBy#, #subjectId#, #isAutoSave#, #compType#, #status#, #descriptionOfStatus#,#teamTypeId# )

SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY ( CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, SUBJECT_ID, TITLE, UPDATED_ON, UPDATED_BY, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, IS_AUTO_SAVED, PARENT_RECORD_ID, CMPY_CORP_TYPE, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS )values ( #autoSaveId#, #crn#, #processCycleId#, #subjectId#, #title#, sysdate, #updateBy#, #tableBottomNotes#, 'Y', #id#, #compType#, #status#, #descriptionOfStatus# )
sqlMap.update: update RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY set TITLE = #title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES = #tableBottomNotes#, PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# , UPDATED_ON=sysdate, UPDATED_BY=#updateBy#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'N', PARENT_RECORD_ID = null, STATUS=#status# , DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS=#descriptionOfStatus#,TEAM_ID=#teamTypeId# where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #id#

update RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY set TITLE=#title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES=#tableBottomNotes#, PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#, UPDATED_ON=sysdate, UPDATED_BY=#updateBy#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'Y', PARENT_RECORD_ID = #id#, STATUS=#status# , DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS=#descriptionOfStatus# where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #autoSaveId#
sqlMap.delete:
delete FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY WHERE CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID in
#ids[]#
delete FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL and CMPY_CORP_TYPE =#componentType#
delete FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.SUBJECT_NAME, to_char(rg.UPDATED_ON, 'DD-Mon-YY HH24:MI:SS') as displayDate, rg.UPDATED_BY, CMPY_CORP_TYPE FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg ,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, rg_subject cs WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.SUBJECT_ID = cs.SUBJECT_ID AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
order by cs.REPORT_ORDER ASC,cc.PROCESSCYCLE_ORDER desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#

SELECT count(*) FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg ,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, rg_subject cs WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.SUBJECT_ID = cs.SUBJECT_ID AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
select count(*) from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST where case_id=#crn#
SELECT CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID, CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, ROW_NO, COLUMN_NO, FIELD_VALUE FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL WHERE CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #value# ORDER BY ROW_NO ASC, COLUMN_NO ASC

Select rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.SUBJECT_NAME, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, rg.TITLE, rg.UPDATED_ON,rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED, rg.CMPY_CORP_TYPE, rg.STATUS, rg.DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, sd.CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID, sd.ROW_NO, sd.COLUMN_NO, sd.FIELD_VALUE FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL sd ON sd.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN rg_subject cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID WHERE rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #id# ORDER BY sd.ROW_NO ASC, sd.COLUMN_NO ASC
SELECT rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg WHERE rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #id#
select count(rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID) FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg WHERE rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID = #id#
SELECT rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg WHERE upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND rg.PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
SELECT rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rg WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL and CMPY_CORP_TYPE ='shareholdersFCPAForm'

select rem.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cc.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rem, cms_casecycle cc where rem.subject_id=#subId# and rem.case_id=#crn# and cc.casecycle_id= rem.processcycleid and upper(rem.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') and rem.CMPY_CORP_TYPE = #compType#
rem.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID != #recordId#

select rem.subject_id subject_id, rem.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cs.subject_name subject_name, ccl.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY rem, rg_subject cs ,CMS_CASECYCLE ccl where cs.CRN = rem.case_id and ccl.CASECYCLE_ID= rem.processcycleid and cs.subject_id =rem.subject_id and rem.case_id = #crn# and rem.CMPY_CORP_TYPE = #compType# order by cs.subject_id, rem.processcycleid
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST ( HISTORY_ID, CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, TITLE, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS ) values( #historyId#,#id#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#crn#,sysdate,#updateBy#,#title#,#tableBottomNotes#,#status#, #descriptionOfStatus# )

insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_HST (HISTORY_ID,CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID,SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID,ROW_NO,COLUMN_NO,FIELD_VALUE) (select RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_HST_SEQ.nextval, CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID,#mgmtId#,#historyId#,ROW_NO, COLUMN_NO,FIELD_VALUE from RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID =#mgmtId#)
sqlMap.select: select HISTORY_ID,ROW_NO,COLUMN_NO,FIELD_VALUE,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID from RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_HST where SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID=#recordId# ORDER BY ROW_NO ASC, COLUMN_NO ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST rg where rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#recordId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT rg.HISTORY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON, rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES
FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST rg,CMS_CASECYCLE cc
WHERE rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#recordId# order by rg.UPDATED_ON desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#
sqlMap.insert: insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL ( CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID, ROW_NO, COLUMN_NO, FIELD_VALUE, CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID )values ( RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #rowNo#, #columnNo#, #fieldValue#, #parentId# )
sqlMap.update: update RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL set ROW_NO=#rowNo#, COLUMN_NO=#columnNo#, FIELD_VALUE=#fieldValue# where CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL WHERE CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID IN
#ids[]#

delete FROM RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY WHERE CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID IN
#ids[]#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY where PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# and SUBJECT_ID = #subjectId# and case_id=#crn# and upper(CMPY_CORP_TYPE)=upper(#compType#) and upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY ( CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, CMPY_CORP_TYPE,TEAM_ID ) select #id#, CASE_ID, #processCycleId#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, sysdate,#userName#, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, CMPY_CORP_TYPE,#teamId# from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID =#recordId#

insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL ( CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID, ROW_NO, COLUMN_NO, FIELD_VALUE, CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID ) SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ROW_NO, COLUMN_NO, FIELD_VALUE,#genSumryId# from RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL Where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#recordId#

SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST (HISTORY_ID,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES)
select #id#,#genSumryId#, SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, sysdate,UPDATED_BY,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#genSumryId#

insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_HST (HISTORY_ID,CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID,SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID,ROW_NO,COLUMN_NO,FIELD_VALUE) select RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_HST_SEQ.nextval,CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL_ID,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID,#genHistoryId#,ROW_NO,COLUMN_NO,FIELD_VALUE from RG_CMPY_CORP_SHARE_DTL where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#genSumryId#

insert into RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST(HISTORY_ID,CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS) SELECT RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_HST_SEQ.nextval,inner_view.* FROM
(SELECT #recList[]# CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID ,SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID , CASE_ID ,sysdate,#userName# UPDATED_BY ,TITLE ,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS from RG_CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY where CMPY_CORP_ANA_SUMRY_ID=#recList[]#)
inner_view
